name: nav-button
description: A simple NAV coin widget for displaying your nav address
author: Brian Scaturro

scripts.build:site: npm run clean && npm run build && mkdir site && cp -r dev/ site && cp dist/{nav-button.js,nav-button.css} site && sed -i "" 's/dev\///g' site/index.html && sed -i "" 's/<!-- build:site -->/<link rel="stylesheet" href="nav-button.css">/g' site/index.html
